name: Betweenside
description: A first-person Gothic fiction set in interwar Cornwall, where players rewrite the story as they go. The patriarch of a once-respected house is dead, survived only by his late sister's children. Left to them are his worldly and unworldly belongings, and the fate of their family.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 Compatible Video Card Storage: 400 MB available space
